PERSONAE.TITLE: Dramatis Personae
PERSONAE.PERSONA: SIWARD, Earl of Northumberland, general of the English forces.
SEYTON, an officer attending on Macbeth.
Lords, Gentlemen, Officers, Soldiers, Murderers, Attendants, and Messengers.

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. A desert place.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Thunder and lightning. Enter three Witches

SPEECH.SPEAKER: First Witch
SPEECH.LINE: When shall we three meet again
In thunder, lightning, or in rain?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: Second Witch
SPEECH.LINE: When the hurlyburly's done,
When the battle's lost and won.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: Third Witch
SPEECH.LINE: That will be ere the set of sun.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: First Witch
SPEECH.LINE: Where the place?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: Second Witch
SPEECH.LINE: Upon the heath.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: Third Witch
SPEECH.LINE: There to meet with Macbeth.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: First Witch
SPEECH.LINE: I come, Graymalkin!

SPEECH.SPEAKER: Second Witch
SPEECH.LINE: Paddock calls.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: Third Witch
SPEECH.LINE: Anon.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: ALL
SPEECH.LINE: Fair is foul, and foul is fair:
Hover through the fog and filthy air.

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. A cavern. In the middle, a boiling cauldron.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: MACDUFF
SPEECH.LINE: He has no children. All my pretty ones?
Did you say all? O hell-kite! All?
What, all my pretty chickens and their dam
At one fell swoop?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: MALCOLM
SPEECH.LINE: Dispute it like a man.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: MACDUFF
SPEECH.LINE: I shall do so;
But I must also feel it as a man:
I cannot but remember such things were,
That were most precious to me. Did heaven look on,
And would not take their part? Sinful Macduff,
They were all struck for thee! naught that I am,
Not for their own demerits, but for mine,
Fell slaughter on their souls. Heaven rest them now!

SPEECH.SPEAKER: MALCOLM
SPEECH.LINE: Be this the whetstone of your sword: let grief
Convert to anger; blunt not the heart, enrage it.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: MACDUFF
SPEECH.LINE: O, I could play the woman with mine eyes
And braggart with my tongue! But, gentle heavens,
Cut short all intermission; front to front
Bring thou this fiend of Scotland and myself;
Within my sword's length set him; if he 'scape,
Heaven forgive him too!

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. Dunsinane. Ante-room in the castle.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter a Doctor of Physic and a Waiting-Gentlewoman

SPEECH.SPEAKER: Doctor
SPEECH.LINE: I have two nights watched with you, but can perceive
no truth in your report. When was it she last walked?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: Gentlewoman
SPEECH.LINE: Since his majesty went into the field, I have seen
her rise from her bed, throw her night-gown upon
her, unlock her closet, take forth paper, fold it,
write upon't, read it, afterwards seal it, and again
return to bed; yet all this while in a most fast sleep.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: Doctor
SPEECH.LINE: A great perturbation in nature, to receive at once
the benefit of sleep, and do the effects of
watching! In this slumbery agitation, besides her
walking and other actual performances, what, at any
time, have you heard her say?

SPEECH.SPEAKER: Gentlewoman
SPEECH.LINE: That, sir, which I will not report after her.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: Gentlewoman
SPEECH.LINE: Good night, good doctor.
